posts.post_content:
Posted By: Eric
A deal fell through, so.......

I'm looking to trade for a T206 w/Red Hindu back.  Graded, ungraded, I don't care (as long as the ungraded card will grade numerically).  

Looking for decent eye appeal, and no paper loss on the back is a must.  Something in the 10-40 grade range.

Would prefer a HOFer to help with my set (T206 back variation set w/HOFer front).  Not particular with the HOFer (I'll take what I can get).

If you have something for trade, email me at: crazylocomerk@yahoo.com

Here are my 3 cards available for trade:

[IMG]http://i282.photobucket.com/albums/kk264/crazylocomerk3/For%20Sale%20or%20Trade/1909-11T206DemmittRayStLouisVariati.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i282.photobucket.com/albums/kk264/crazylocomerk3/For%20Sale%20or%20Trade/1909-11T206ManningRube_PitchingUZIT.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i282.photobucket.com/albums/kk264/crazylocomerk3/For%20Sale%20or%20Trade/1915T214VictoryTobaccoKellyJoe.jpg[/IMG]

Posted By: Adam
Nice cards Eric, wish I had a red hindu to trade you!  

In case you have not seen them, there are 3 red hindus in the REA auction (at least I think there are 3 . . . I'm still scrolling page by page through the auction online).

Good luck with your quest,
Adam

Posted By: Steve Murray
Wish I had one too. Love the Uzit.

Posted By: Eric
Thanks fellas.  I appreciate the compliments.

And I wish you guys had one too [IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/images/happy.gif[/IMG]

Adam, I did see those in REA.  They are absolutely beautiful cards, but a little too high grade for my collection (and not by choice).
